block.field: Return true if both inputs equal each other.
Return the modulo of the two numbers.

Return the quotient of the two numbers.

Return true if the first input is greater than the second input.
Return true if the second input is greater than the first input.
Returns a combination of the two input strings added together.

Repeat a statement several times until a condition is met.
Return a random integer between the two numbers (inclusive).
Return true if the input is false. Returns false if the input is true.
